3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 6:30 pm
* 1st and 3rd Thursday of every month
* City Hall  
  Council Chambers  
  665 Country Club Road  
  Lucas, TX 75002

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.lucastexas.us/129/Agendas-Minutes)

Overview
--------

On occasion, the City Council may adjust its meeting dates, times, and locations. If you would like to speak at a City Council meeting, fill out a [Request to Speak form (DOC)](https://www.lucastexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/215).

Lucas City Council meetings are open to on-site visitors and can be [livestreamed](https://www.lucastexas.us/163/Public-Meetings-Agendas-Minutes) on the City website. If you would like to speak on a particular agenda item, but are unable to attend the meeting, please [send an email to the City Secretary](mailto:tkimball@lucastexas.us) by 3:30 pm on the day of the meeting.

### [FAQs](https://www.lucastexas.us/Faq.aspx?TID=20)

[How many Councilmembers are there?](https://www.lucastexas.us/164/City-Council#)
:   Seven Councilmembers, including the Mayor.

[How long is a Councilmember term?](https://www.lucastexas.us/164/City-Council#)
:   The Mayor and Councilmembers shall be elected by the qualified voters of the entire City for a term of three years.

[Where can I find City Council agendas and minutes?](https://www.lucastexas.us/164/City-Council#)
:   You can find past and future City Council meeting agendas and minutes on the [Agendas and Minutes page](https://www.lucastexas.us/129/Agendas-Minutes).

[View All FAQs](https://www.lucastexas.us/Faq.aspx?TID=20)

### City of Lucas

1. 665 Country Club Road
2. Lucas, Texas 75002-7651
3. Phone: [972-727-8999](tel:9727278999)
4. Fax: 972-727-0091
5. Business Hours
6. Monday to Friday: 8 am to 5 pm
